alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 1:19PM CDT until June 25 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL MADISON AND EAST CENTRAL LIMESTONE COUNTIES... At 119 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madison, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Athens, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama A And M University, University Of Alabama In Huntsville, Marshall Space Flight Center, French Mill and Capshaw. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
